snippet.title: A Death in the Red Light | Release Date Announcement Trailer | indie.io
snippet.description:
Wishlist A Death in the Red Light Today
 ➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2866640/A_Death_in_the_Red_Light/

Become the Detective in This Gripping Murder Mystery Puzzle Adventure!

Step into the gritty streets of 1988 Amsterdam in this story-driven puzzle experience. Inspired by real-life cases, you’ll gather clues, interrogate suspects, and solve intricate puzzles to uncover the truth behind a high-stakes murder. This is your chance at redemption—solve the case and reclaim your place on the force!

🔍Non-Linear Investigation: Piece together evidence your way as you navigate a web of crime and corruption in the city’s notorious Red Light District.
🔍Engaging Puzzles: Utilize real police and forensic techniques to analyze clues, decode cryptic messages, and run ballistics.
🔍Explore Amsterdam’s Dark Corners: Wander through iconic canals and dangerous streets, including Heroin Alley, where danger is always lurking.

Visit indie.io on Steam 
➤https://bit.ly/4e91q5q
